title: 你(的脸色)看起来很苍白。你还好吗?
answer: You look pale. Are you all right?

title: 不要和你的朋友们并肩骑车。
answer: Don't ride side by side with your friends.

title: 当交通信号灯正要变成红色时，一辆汽车突然出现在拐角。
answer: While the lights were changing to red, a car suddenly appeared round the corner.

title: 汽车恰好及时停了下来,但是男孩从自行车上摔了下来并伤到了膝盖。
answer: The car stopped just in time, but the boy fell off his bike and hurt his knee.

title: 两次事故后,他答应听从我的劝告。
answer: After the two accidents, he promised to takemy advice.

title: 我正试图捡起它(那条蛇)，突然它(蛇)又咬了我一口。
answer: I was trying to pick it up when it bit me again.

title: 当蛇平躺在桌子上的时候,亨利快速拿起他的手机,拍了一张蛇的照片。
answer: While the snake was lying on the table, Henry quickly picked up his mobile phone and took a photo with it.
